name: Self-Closing Door Hinges
location: Master Bedroom and Master Bathroom Doors
description: These spring loaded door hinges are now causing our doors to close automatically! It is a great way to keep the baby out of our bathroom when she is wandering around!

name: Bathroom Towel Rack
description: This was one of my earlier projects. The sanding/staining took a while because I put on 5 coats of poly to make it as water/steam proof as possible. I found the hooks at World Market.
